thread.section_title: Precision Tax Relief Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Precision Tax Relief | www.precisiontaxrelief.com
thread.title: Randy Best
thread.title_full: Precision Tax Relief reviewed by Randy Best

author: Randy Best
title: Randy Best
text:
Overall a good experience with all contacts at Precision. One in particular stood out to me as outstanding. Mark Jeffrey gave my files an additional look to discover a refund owed me from 2013 the IRS missed. When the check came in, needless to say, I was pleasantly surprised. A bright spot in an otherwise unwelcome exercise with the agency. Thanks Mark - great job!
Randy Best
Lumberton Texas
